name: rikueco-analytics-functions
description: Google Cloud Functions for Rikueco Job Navi Analytics

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy getAnalyticsData --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:sendEmail: gcloud functions deploy sendEmail --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 --set-env-vars SENDGRID_API_KEY=$SENDGRID_API_KEY
scripts.deploy:inboundParse: gcloud functions deploy inboundParse --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:getEmails: gcloud functions deploy getEmails --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:calendar: gcloud functions deploy initiateCalendarAuth --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy calendarOAuthCallback --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy getCalendarAvailability --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy createCalendarEvent --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy getCalendarIntegration --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3 && gcloud functions deploy revokeCalendarAuth --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:createCompanyUser: gcloud functions deploy createCompanyUser --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:createCompanyStaff: gcloud functions deploy createCompanyStaff --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:deleteCompanyUser: gcloud functions deploy deleteCompanyUser --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:migrateCompanyUsers: gcloud functions deploy migrateCompanyUsersToFirebaseAuth --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:legacyLogin: gcloud functions deploy legacyLogin --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:auth: npm run deploy:createCompanyUser && npm run deploy:createCompanyStaff && npm run deploy:deleteCompanyUser && npm run deploy:migrateCompanyUsers && npm run deploy:legacyLogin
scripts.deploy:syncSalaryData: gcloud functions deploy syncSalaryData --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:getSalaryData: gcloud functions deploy getSalaryData --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:salary: npm run deploy:syncSalaryData && npm run deploy:getSalaryData
